Plot: The story takes place in an alternate reality where a small percentage of children manifest superhuman abilities upon reaching puberty. A focus is placed on Yuu Otosaka, a high school boy who awakens the ability to temporarily possess others, which brings him to the attention of Nao Tomori, the student council president of a school founded as a haven for children with such abilities.
Title: Charlotte
Actors: Ray Chase, Koki Uchiyama, Ayane Sakura, Momo Asakura
